title: Iran Acknowledges Sending Drones to Russia, but Says This Preceded War
description: Russia has used Iranian-made drones in a series of deadly strikes on Ukrainian cities, according to Ukrainian and Western officials.
dc:creator: Cassandra Vinograd
media:credit: Brendan Hoffman for The New York Times
media:description: Rescue workers at a residential building in Kyiv, Ukraine, that was struck by a Russian drone attack in October.
